Test frequency - Structural Fill - 1 test per material type per earthworks zone,
• Buttress Fill - 1 test per material type per earthworks zone
• GAP65 - 1 test per material type per structure / location
• Cement Stabilised GAP65/ Structural Fill - 1 Test per material type per structure/ location
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Method/Description - In situ moisture content and density
Test frequency - Structural Fill - 1 test per 1 m lift per 100m length (approx 1 per 3000 m3) ; 1 test per lift per 50m length for top 1m of fill to subgrade level
• Buttress fill - 1 test per 200m length, approx 1 per 6000 m3
• GAP65 - 4 tests per lift per structure
• Cement Stabilised GAP65 - 4 Tests per 0.5m lift per structure
• Cement Stabilised Structural fill - 1 test per 0.5m lift per 100m length
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Test frequency - Structural fill - 1 test per layer per 1000m2
• Buttress Fill - 1 Test per layer per 2000m2
• Cement Stabilised Structural Fill - 1 test per layer per 500m2
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Method/Description - in situ moisture content and density (and/ or air voids) testing of compacted fill material
Test frequency - Surcharged Fills - 1 test at subgrade formation level per 50m length, Cut Fill Transitions - 1 Test per 0.5m lift per 50m length for 1.0m subgrade depth
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Test frequency - 435mm above Subgrade formation level to 1.5m depth. 3 tests per 20m chainage evenly across formation pavement width
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Method/Description - Benkelman beam and FWD Testing
Test frequency - Surcharged Fills - At subgrade formation level 10m interval in each wheel path
• Cut Fill Transitions - at three heights: 1.0m, 0.5m and 0m below subgrade formation level 10m interval in each wheel path
Verifying Records Checklists, Test and Supplier Certificates - Test report
Test frequency - Surcharged Fills and Cut Fill Transitions - 1 Test per 5000m2 at subgrade formation level

Test frequency - Plate settlement marker, extensometer, profilometer, water standpipe, and lateral deformation marker- twice weekly Vibrating wire piezometer - hourly reading via data logger, twice weekly download

Test frequency - Plate settlement marker, extensometer and profilometer, and lateral deformation marker - twice weekly for the first month then weekly. Vibrating wire piezometer - hourly reading via data logger, twice weekly download

Method/Description - Monitoring at surcharge removal or hold period release
Test frequency - Plate settlement marker, extensometer and profilometer, lateral deformation marker, and vibrating wire piezometer - one reading 24 hours prior and one reading 24 hours following.
Method/Description - Summary of site inspection / observation / measurement
Test frequency - Within one working day of site inspection/observation/measurement
Test frequency - During construction and at end
